overview: Deep within the mysterious Arboria Institute, a disturbed and beautiful girl is held captive by a doctor in search of inner peace. Her mind controlled by a sinister technology. Silently, she waits for her next session with deranged therapist Dr. Barry Nyle. If she hopes to escape, she must journey through the darkest reaches of The Institute, but Nyle won ºt easily part with his most gifted and dangerous creation.
tagline: Beyond Science. Beyond Sanity. Beyond Control.
title: Beyond the Black Rainbow
